snippet: One of two men charged with killing Hadiya Pendleton, who performed at President Obama’s inauguration last month, said he shot her because “she was just there” as he targeted a rival gang.
abstract: Michael Ward, charged in shooting death of 15-year-old Chicago girl Hadiya Pendleton, tells police that he shot her simply because 'she was there' when he targeted a rival gang; Pendleton, a majorette, had performed at Pres Obama's inauguration before her death.
lead_paragraph: One of two men charged with killing Hadiya Pendleton, who performed at President Obama’s inauguration last month, said he shot her because “she was just there” as he targeted a rival gang.
